accounting_unit_data_mart.query: select st.paid_price, CAST(st.create_date as DATE) from sales_tx_t stt left join sales_t st on stt.sales_id = st.id where stt.status = true;
accounting_unit_data_mart.columns: CREATE_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT null, PAID_PRICE NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL

marketing_unit_data_mart.query: select st.name store_name, st.status store_status, st2.create_date sales_date, st2.paid_price sales_price from sales_tx_t stt left join store_t st on stt.store_id = st.id left join sales_t st2 on stt.sales_id = st2.id where stt.status = true
marketing_unit_data_mart.columns: store_name VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, store_status BOOL NOT null, sales_date TIMESTAMP NOT null, sales_price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL
